page.title: 11OUR HOBBIES-3
page.content: because my brother is on the trailer stacking the bales.I also like helping my dad when we are doing lambing.Some- times my dad lets me take thelamb off, And I also hold the sheep when my brother isn't there, when my dad takes the lamb off.Sometimes I check my dad's sheep for him.I also like helping my dad when he feeds his cattle. MARK WARWICK. My hobby is fungi collecting.Every Autumn my dad,sister and I go fungi collecting.We collect about 10 different species of edible fungi. Sometimes we just fry them in butter or else we dry them and use them in winter for soups,stews and other recipies.In our family I am the only one who does'nt like mushrooms.You might think I am scared of being poisoned, but I always try new species
